title: The seuen vials or a briefe and plaine exposition vpon the 15: and 16: chapters of the Revelation very pertinent and profitable for the Church of God in these last times. By H.B. rector of Saint Matthews Friday-street.
author: Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by William Iones, dwelling in Red-crosse-street,
